S+
If support partner is on player team,\ngain Atk/Spd/Def/Res+2\nduring combat.
HP+7, Atk/Spd/Def/Res+2

Giving Bouquets:
When you give a Bouquet to a
Hero, they gain the effects of the
Entwined Hero.

Effect 1:
Ally and Summoner Support
Ranks increase with each
deployment, up to a maximum
Support Rank of S+, surpassing S.

Summoner Support Rank S+ adds
HP+2, and Ally Support Rank S+
removes the distance requirement
of the Rank S support benefit that
grants Atk/Spd/Def/Res+2 when
they fight right next to each other.

Effect 2:
When an Entwined Hero and their
support partner are receiving
support benefits, they also gain a
stat boost during combat (differs
based on the Bouquet).

More Information:
Bouquets can be given to Heroes
other than Entwined Heroes.

If a Hero gains stat boosts from
theirs and their support partner's
Bouquets, only the highest value
boost for each stat will apply.

What Forma Do Not Inherit:
・ Merges
・ Ascended Assets
・ Resplendent Attire
・ Aide's Essences
・ Bouquets
・ Blessings
・ Sacred Seals
・ Accessories
Archive of the West
Doughnut Feast
Three days without a proper meal...\nI wonder, who will claim what's left?
A mouse stealing the food? Oh no...\nQuick reflexes never cease to amaze.
Do we have a doughnut hog?\nWhy not share food so delicious?!
Wow! A whole tower of doughnuts?!\nThey'll surely stave off hunger now.
To Bring Smiles
The allies share a bond beyond measure!\nFighting at any distance yields a stat boost.
You share a bond beyond measure!\nYour ally's stats are further increased.
